trans-unit.source: Provides access to tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> for a workflow instance.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance objects are returned by a call to both <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and provide access to the tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> for a specific workflow instance.
The SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance class optimizes its access to the database for its properties, which maintain collections.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.

Gets the list of activity tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, ActivityEvents contains all activity tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, ActivityEvents contains the activity tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
ActivityEvents contains activity tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance.

Activity tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits an activity status event that corresponds to an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.
The list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether property data for this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> should be automatically updated when it is accessed.

To optimize database performance, properties that maintain collections of queried data, such as <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A>, query the database for new elements only when the property is accessed, and the collection for such a property is only updated on an as-required basis when the property is accessed.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed.

When you get one of the collection properties, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property.
The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh.
If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed.
Set AutoRefresh to `true` to perform a refresh every time a collection property is accessed and ensure that the tracking data returned in the collection maintained by that property is always current.
If AutoRefresh is `false`, you must call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> to reset the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if property data should be automatically refreshed when it is accessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the time at which the first <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref> for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.

A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the time at which the first <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref> for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.
Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.

If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, InvokedWorkflows contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, InvokedWorkflows contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance.
The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance or an empty <xref:System.Guid> if this workflow instance was not invoked by another workflow instance.
Updates the property data for this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
Refresh does not actually load any data for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>.
To optimize database performance, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class loads data for its collection properties on an as-required basis.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed.

When you get one of the collection properties, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property.
The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh.
If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed.
Refresh sets the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh to <xref:System.DateTime.utcNow%2A>.
Gets the status of the workflow instance.

Status is determined based on the tracking data for the workflow instance, specifically on the workflow tracking records sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure; therefore Status depends, in part, on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> maps to one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
If no workflow tracking records have been sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance, Status is <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> that represents the current status of the workflow instance.

Gets the list of user tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, UserEvents contains all user tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, UserEvents contains the user tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
UserEvents contains user tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance.

User tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a user event that corresponds to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.
The list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
Gets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the current workflow definition for the workflow instance.
The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the current workflow definition for the workflow instance.
Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow has been updated since the last time <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowDefinition*> was loaded.
The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow has been updated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets the list of workflow tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, WorkflowEvents contains all workflow tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, WorkflowEvents contains the workflow tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
WorkflowEvents contains workflow tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance.

Workflow tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a workflow status event that corresponds to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.
The list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> applies.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> applies.
Gets or sets a number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.
This is an internal join operation.
WorkflowInstanceInternalId provides a more efficient way to access data for a workflow instance in a SQL database than by using a workflow instance <xref:System.Guid>.
Use WorkflowInstanceInternalId to find related records for this workflow instance in separate views.
A number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.
Gets and sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance.
The <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance.
